p: Key protein targets and ligands in this article are hyperlinked to corresponding entries in http://www.guidetopharmacology.org, the common portal for data from the IUPHAR/BPS Guide to PHARMACOLOGY (Harding et al., 2018), and are permanently archived in the Concise Guide to PHARMACOLOGY2019/20 (Alexander, Christopoulos, et al., 2019; Alexander, Fabbro, et al., 2019a, 2019b).
